sentences.sContent: I went into medicine to care for patients, not to waste time bickering over budgets.
sentences.sCn: 我从医是为了治病救人，不是为了预算争吵而浪费时间。
…当国与国之间为领土而争执不断时。

sentences.sContent: The election will end months of political bickering.
sentences.sCn: 这场选举将结束几个月以来的政治争论。

trans.tranOther: When people bicker, they argue or quarrel about unimportant things
